summary: A shy duelist stumbles upon the legendary Red Eyes Black Dragon, with that card in his possession, he must learn to bring out his confidence to duel.
cast: Yumi Kakazu|Hisako Kyôda|Konomi Maeda|Hikaru Midorikawa|Toshiyuki Morikawa|Yukana Nogami|Megumi Ogata|Ryôtarô Okiayu|Emi Uwagawa|Eiko Yamada
title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
